tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP$ My) (NN heart)) (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (RB so) (JJ happy) (SBAR (S (NP-TMP (NN today)) (VP (VBP #love) (NP (JJ #peace) (NN #greatful)))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [happy/JJ nsubj>[heart/NN nmod:poss>My/PRP$] cop>is/VBZ advmod>so/RB ccomp>[#love/VBP dep>today/NN dobj>[#greatful/NN amod>#peace/JJ]]]
